sentences.en: A staircase leads to the upper storey .
sentences.cn: 有一段楼梯通往上面一层。

sentences.en: A staircase leads to the upper storey.
sentences.cn: 有一段楼梯通往上面一层。

sentences.en: A wide area round the two-storey building is sealed to all traffic except the emergency services.
sentences.cn: 那个两层建筑周围的大片区域被封锁，只有提供应急服务的车辆可以通行。

sentences.en: He's a bit weak in the top storey , ie not very intelligent.
John was on the uppermost floor of the three-storey gatehouse.
sentences.cn: 约翰在三层门房的最高层。

sentences.en: Light gauge steel storey - adding structure can satisfy the expected goal.
sentences.cn: 轻钢加层结构的层间位移可以满足预期目标.

sentences.en: Look at that sixteen - storey building!
Our ten - storey building is out of straight.
sentences.cn: 我们那幢10层大楼倾斜了.

sentences.en: That new multi - storey car - park is an utter monstrosity!
sentences.cn: 那座新建的多层停车场难看极了!

sentences.en: That new multi - storey carpark is a real eyesore.
sentences.cn: 那座新的多层停车场实在难看.

sentences.en: The accident a site where a 25 - storey building was to be demolished.
sentences.cn: 意外现场为一幢清拆中的楼宇,楼高25层.

sentences.en: The distribution of storey shearing force in frame - shear wall structure is discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了框剪结构在弹性和弹塑性工作状态下楼层剪力的分配机理.

sentences.en: The top storey of this building is our company's headquarters.
sentences.cn: 这座大厦的顶层是我们公司的总部.

sentences.en: The upper storey projects over the street.
There stands a three - storey - high building on the comer of the street.
sentences.cn: 街角矗立着一坐3层高的房子.

sentences.en: There's a nine - storey apartment building next to the bank.
sentences.cn: 银行旁边有一座九层高的宿舍大楼.

sentences.en: Tom's sister says he is weak in the upper storey.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的妹妹说他脑子笨.

trans.tran_en: A storey of a building is one of its different levels, which is situated above or below other levels
